documents.document:
According To Sigmund Freud:

Human beings are funny..

They long to be with people they love but refuse to admit openly. Some are afraid to show even the slightest sign of affection because of fear. Fear that their feeling may not be recognized or, even worse, returned..

But one thing about human beings that puzzles me the most is their object of affection, even if it kills them slowly within..

-Sigmund Freud

Men Are Seldom Made

There are things in life that you can't hold on to forever, no matter how much you fight for it..

Sometimes destiny isn't always good, it becomes playful..

When you meet someone you learned to love, you relate your crying over love stories, hand you the remote, pass on booze night just to listen to your ranting, don't flare up when you give car directions, says I'm sorry and tells you he needs you.

Now if you think you've found your man -- Rejoice! And never let him go.

MEN ARE SELDOM MADE!

Lessons Learned

Those who appear in your life- whether to help or to harm- are all given by God.

Meet all of them with a peaceful heart, but with a warrior's spirit.

You may fail many times, but in falling you will learn. And in learning, you will find your way.

Remember, there are no mistakes in life- only lessons. And lessons will keep on repeating themselves until "LEARNED"

Don't Waste Your Time

Don't waste your time on someone who doesn't appreciate you the way you should be appreciated. Don't ever settle for mediocrity. For being just an option, for being the one who's just fun to be with, for being the one who's always there desperately waiting, for mere concern or pity or for someone who likes you just because he/she knows he's/she's got the power to break you. Don't settle because deep down, you know who you are. And you know without a doubt that you deserve better if not the best..

Use "I love you" In The Right Way

Begin to learn that kisses don't always mean something.. That promises can be broken just as quick as they're made.. That sometimes goodbyes are really forever.. And always remember to use "I love you" with extreme caution.. Coz if you used it in a wrong way, someone will end up getting hurt.. Remember that it shouldn't be an everyday word.. It also shouldn't be said just because you're expected to say it.. Make sure you know how and when to use it.. Coz once you're in love.. It shouldn't be that easy to fall out of love..

Denial

Sometimes denial is what makes us survive..
We deny that we're tired..
We deny that we're scared..
We deny how badly we want to succeed..
We deny that we're hurting..
And we deny that we're in denial..
We only see what we want to see..
And we believe what we want to believe..
We lie to ourselves so much that after a while the lie seems to be the truth..
We deny so much tha we can't recognize the truth right in front of our faces..

Sometimes

Sometimes love means letting go when you want a person to stay...

Sometimes love means asking for less when you begin to expect too much...

Sometimes love means moving on even if there is still a reason to stay...

Sometimes we just have to be thankful that we have loved someone...

Even if that person didn't love us back, for it is always better to have loved and failed than not to have experienced it at all...

Beauty vs. Brains

You can walk into a room wearing a shirt and jeans, no make-up and still be the most attractive girl in the room..

At the end of the day, what makes a man ask for your number or want to ask you out, is not because you look like America's next top model, but because you are a woman with opinion..

Fashion sense helps, but brains will always be more deadly than a pair of stilletos..

Friendship

Friend..

Someone to be with., thru thick and thin.,

Hardships and victories., happiness and pain.,

SOMEBODY

Who is willing to listen and not judge...

SOMEONE...

Who will lift you when your down,. warm you when your cold.,

A PERSON...

Who will be your strength when your weak,.
Who will be your hope when your broke...

And never will he or she do anything to make your friendship shatter into pieces., instead, he or she will do the right thing to make the word "FRIENDSHIP" WORTHWHILE...

Great Things About Friends

-! They will give you a loan at a much better rate than the bank.

-! Shares your drink without fear of germs.

-! Friends are better at cheering you up than parents are.

-! Just hearing your friend's voice makes you feel better.

-! Someone with whom you can trust your online password.

-! Without your bestfriend, you would never dare to go to high school reunion.

-! Waits with you until your bus comes.

and lastly..

-! A friendship is less likely to break up than a marriage.

Whenever

Whenever you find yourself collide with the truth and the reality it brings, open your eyes and slowly open your heart as well..

Never ignore the things you know you can;t avoid and never set aside something you know you can't live without..

But never take back the things you already gave away; never ask for something in return..

Bottom line, be brave enough to accept things you can never have and be wise enough to see the things you've always had..

'Coz all your life you shall collide with truth, might as well get used to it. ..

18 Love Questuons

If you opened it, you have to do it.
Or a loved 1 will be in an accident
even if u didnt mean to open still do
it ok!

1. Three Things You Are Wearing Right
Now:

…sanrio, dress, cycling…

2. Five Things you cant live without:

-celfone
-money
-mirror
-foods
-clothes

You must answer every question
TRUTHFULLY!

1. Are you currently in a
relationship?

…yes…

4. Have you ever been in love?

…of course yes!...

5. Do you believe that everyone has a
soul-mate?

…uhmm, maybe yes…

6. Whats/Who is your current problem?

…my mother. Haha!...

7. Have you ever had your heart
broken?

…yes!...

8.Your thoughts of online or long
distance relationship?

…well, I think it depends on the two persons who had that kind of relationship. For some it works, for some it doesn’t. I think communication is a big factor so the relationship will work right…

9.Have you ever seen a friend as more
than a friend?

…a big YES!...

10. Do you believe the
statement/quote "once a cheater always
a cheater"?

…before. But now I don’t think so because people change. And I think everyone deserves a chance to prove themselves that they’ve changed for good…

11.How many kids do you want to have?

…2. a boy and a girl…

12.What is/are your favorite color(s)?

…all shades of BLUE. Pro pde ndin ung pink and purple…

13. Do you believe you only love once?

…no…

14.are you and your ex, friends?

…yup, some of them…

15.Imagine you are 40 , you have kids
& your spouse just died, would you
get re-married?

…no, I won’t na. I think I’m too old na to be married again and I think I love my husband and my kids so much that I can’t even think of doing that. And maybe I’m contented na nun…

16. at what age did you start liking
the opposite sex?

…kinder yta? He was also my 1st kiss dn yta s lips. Haha! So funny…

17. What song do u want to be played
at your wedding?

…Grow Old With You…

18. Do you like anyone right now?

…I love my boyfriend!...

Now post this as "18 love questions";.
If you opened it, you have to do it
Back

Love Fades

I guess that love does fade.

That sometimes the heart does get tired of longing, of hoping.

That sometimes you just have to accept the fact that some things can never be and that you should be contented with things as they are.

Leaving is a choice.

Staying is a choice.

But you can never really ask someone to stay or leave.

It's a choice thay have to make for themselves and sometimes no matter how much you beg someone to stay or how hard you try to make someone leave, you really have no control over what they will choose..

GREAT FACTS

Great facts:

1> Regular naps prevent old age, especially if you take them while driving.

2> Having one child makes you a parent; having two makes you a referee.

3> Marriage is a relationship wherein one person is always right and the other person is the husband.

4> They said we should all pay our taxes with a smile. I tried but they wanted cash.

5> The human brain functions 24hour/day, 365 days/year, even before the time you were born... until you would fall in love!

When You're Stuck...

When you're stuck loving someone, no matter how hard you try to forget that person, it's just not enough..

Sometimes all we can do is stay away, and it does help a bit, but just for a while..

Coz when that person shoes you even the smallest gesture of affection, all your efforts of moving on go down the drain..

And you're left alone again with nothing else to say but...

"Damn! I just fell for that again..."

Be Contented

Sometimes we seem never contented with what we have,
We were given good but we keep on seeking for the best
Which sometimes leads us to missing the simple yet satisfying part of this journey..

Just like in love..

We set requirements,

we target the ideal..

So where do we end up?!

We end up hoping that the ones we have left behind still have space for us,

Because the one we thought to be ideal doesn't seem to see us that way... huhu, ouch. . .

Silence Etc...

Silence '_' doesn't always mean yes, it may also mean no but its better left unsaid.

Anger doesn't always mean hatred, it could just be a means of coping.

Laughter :') doesnt always mean happiness, sometimes it's just a mask.

Tears :,c don't always mean sorrow, they may also be an outlet of joy.

Staying away doesn't always mean its the end, it may also mean the best beginning..

Live, Laugh, Love!

..as we grow up, we learn that even the one person that wasn't supposed to ever let you down will probably will.

You'll break hearts..

You'll fight with your bestfriend..

You'll blame a new love for things an old one did..

You'll cry because time is passing too fast..

And you'll eventually lose someone you love.

So take too many pictures..

Laugh too much..

And love like you've never been hurt.

Remember that every 60 seconds you spend upset is a minute of happiness you'll never get back..

When A Guy Loves A Girl

When a guy loves a girl he'll bring out her natural best.

When a guy loves a girl he'll be proud of her even at her worst.

When a guy loves a girl he'll say that she's pretty even at her ugliest.

When a guy loves a girl he'll never leave her especially at her weakest.

When a guy loves a girl he'll never get even tired of caressing her.

When a guy loves a girl he'll come back to her after she rejects him

Coz no matter how cruel the situation would be,

If a guy loves a girl he'll make a way no matter how hard it could be.

Mysterious Love

It's easy to say goodbye but too hard to forget.

Why?

Cause love is more than words can say.
Once you've fallen, you can't help but fall over and over again.
So even if goodbyes have been said, there's something in the heart that says,

"please stay."

Why?

Cause it's love.
And the reason is unknown.
Despite the pain and the heartaches, love will always retain,

It's pride.
It's sweetness.
It's mystery.

Global Warming

Global warming, a phenomenon that involves the species of this generation and the generations to come, it is the result of human's nonstop search for innovation and misuse of natural resources..

Due to this abusive acts, earth lost its ability to aid itself..

Since we are the reason why global warming entered our vocabulary, each of us have the responsibility and privilege to help earth aid itself..

Before it gets too late..

Your complete effort can make a big change for the next generation..

Save our planet!
Save our home!

Special Level of Comfort

There's a special level of comfort between two matching souls.. An unbreakable bond of constant support and closeness.. It's when a warm embrace feels so right.. Or when two hands fit so snugly.. It's a feeling that's hard to define but easy to recognize.. And when you find that comfort you just know, you'll never let go..
